title: Ankidroid alpha90, crash after trying to edit tags
body:
###### Reproduction Steps

1. Open. Ankidroid
2. Sync ur collection
3. Try to add a note
4. Just pressing tags field


###### Expected Result

Editing tags 

###### Actual Result

Ankidroid breaks down

###### Debug info
AnkiDroid Version = 2.16alpha90

Android Version = 7.0

Manufacturer = SPA Condor Electronics

Model = PGN611

Hardware = mt6735

Webview User Agent = Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 7.0; PGN611 Build/NRD90M; wv) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/4.0 Chrome/107.0.5304.105 Mobile Safari/537.36

ACRA UUID = a54b0669-a918-4964-a718-1c3403f95912

New schema = false

Scheduler = std2

Crash Reports Enabled = true

DatabaseV2 Enabled = true

###### Research
*Enter an [x] character to confirm the points below:*

- [x] I have read the [support page](https://ankidroid.org/docs/help.html) and am reporting a bug or enhancement request specific to AnkiDroid
- [x] I have checked the [manual](https://ankidroid.org/docs/manual.html) and the [FAQ](https://github.com/ankidroid/Anki-Android/wiki/FAQ) and could not find a solution to my issue
- [x] I have searched for similar existing issues here and on the user forum
- [x] (Optional) I have confirmed the issue is not resolved in the latest alpha release ([instructions](https://docs.ankidroid.org/manual.html#betaTesting))

NB : if I just use it without loading my own collection it doesn't crush
NB2 : after it breakdown it make a crash report 

https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/21174375/202903076-f1cffe7c-533f-43b6-9b75-af31480d4981.mp4
